information.en: Creates a b0-map image and calculates is mean and std from a gre field map (2 mag images, 1 phase diff image). NOTE: This recipe assumes the first scan is the gre field map, as such it will collect and copy the first 3 images, leaving all other images unaltered.

regulatory_information.special_operating_instructions: WARNING: This recipe has not been tested on an MRI Machine
regulatory_information.additional_relevant_information: cbsb0stats assumes your first scan is a gre field map, and thus will attempt to create a b0-map from the first 3 images, (assume to be 2 magnitude images and 1 phase difference image). After this it will ignore all further images and pass them through without alteration.

information.en: Define the config to be executed by MRD server
Send a copy of original first 3 unmodified images back too.
